MS MCQs

    Set up job planning lines in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. You want to budget four hours of project management time that you don’t plan to charge to the customer. How can you accomplish this task?

      By creating a job planning line with the Budget and Billable type and then entering 0 in the Unit Price field.

      By creating a job planning line with the Budget type and then entering 0 in the Unit Cost and Unit Price fields.

      By creating a job planning line with the Budget type.

      By creating a job planning line with the Budget and Billable type and then clearing the Chargeable field.


    2. Which one of the following statements is true about job task lines?

      Each job task line of type Posting must have at least one planning line.

      For each job task line of type Posting, you can only create one planning line for each resource.

      You can split planning lines of the Both Budget and Billable type.

      Each job must have at least one planning line.
